rules.natural: If the team uses a tracking collar, then the expedition is successful.
Either the team uses a tracking collar or the team operates a drone.
Provided that the team identifies a poaching threat, the team protects endangered species.
The team identifies a poaching threat or the team reports illegal activity.
Provided that the expedition can continue research, then if the team reports illegal activity, the team preserves the ecosystem.
If the team has a permit for the national park, then whenever the expedition has funding from a grant, the expedition can continue research.
Either the team follows protocol or the team adheres to guidelines.
If the team adheres to guidelines, then the team has a permit for the national park.
Whenever the team coordinates with authorities, the team assists in enforcement.
If the team operates a drone, then the team deploys a camera trap.
Whenever the team assists in enforcement, the team supports protection.
Provided that the team supports protection, if the team follows protocol, then the team has a permit for the national park.
If the expedition receives approval, then under the condition that the expedition has funding from a grant, whenever the team reports illegal activity, the team preserves the ecosystem.
The expedition lacks authorization or the expedition receives approval.
If the expedition is approved by the government, then it is not the case that the expedition lacks authorization.
The team submits an application or the team provides documentation.
Whenever the team provides documentation, if the expedition meets requirements, then the expedition is approved by the government.

rules.natural: If the committee grants permission, then whenever the authorities review the proposal, provided that the team submits an application, if the expedition meets requirements, the expedition is approved by the government.
